website_summaries.verdict: The best Kinect-based Xbox One game available is sure to get the entire family moving.
pros: The Kinect's spot-on motion tracking makes this collection of climbing, soccer, tennis, bowling, target shooting, and wake racing a blast to play with the entire family
The Kinect scanner does an excellent job of putting your likeness in the game, and it’s fun to customize your in-game twin with unique gear and outfits, too

customer_reviews.title: Great but buggy and laggy
customer_reviews.text: I like because of the games, but it doesn't register well with the Kinect. I found I have to make movements twice in order for it to register and sometimes its buggy during the contests to where you make a movement and you end up losing because it didn't register. And I do not have any issues with other Kinect games that I own, I even recalibrated it for this game twice
customer_reviews.author: Jay Norwood

customer_reviews.title: Game doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: The game worked 1 time after installation and since has failed to load. Played the game once today with my kids. Went to play again in the afternoon and the game no longer works after initial startup
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Kinect Sports Rivals-Late Bloomer, Was Apprehensive@1st, But Worth It&Happy.
customer_reviews.text: To One and To All! Please do not count on reviews or have discouragement of buying this game. if you have it in your heart to get the game then do so, why care what others think and stop you from being excited, it is fun and enjoyable. what your avatar comes out in this XBox1 Game you will be amazed. other people will differ in their oppinion, but it is all up to you. if you are not really that sure? do some more home work about the game. trust me you will have fun, with your family, friends, or a social gathering at your home. I am a late bloomer about this game, it' is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Movements don't seem to translate well into the game. Some of the games are a little fun but some, like the soccer, are pretty dumb. It might be more fun for children but getting the ball down the field is incredibly easy and so is blocking the shots. The shooting didn't seem very responsive either. Overall, playing the game made me feel like there's something wrong with my kinect. And from playing other games I know that's not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Not worth buying
customer_reviews.text: The old Kinect sports were very fun so I was excited to get this one. Unfortunately, it just doesn't seem as fun to me. The games are alright, and most games you can only play with 2 people. The only one you can play with more than 2 people is bowling. The other thing that I'm disappointed about is that they got rid of party play and all the mini game variations that were a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jason W.

customer_reviews.title: Not for XBox One S All Digital Edition.. Look for the CD player in your xBox before ordering.
customer_reviews.text: Only for XBox One with an embedded CD Player. Not working with external CD player.
customer_reviews.author: Comnul

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this game is as fun as its predecessors. I think I just expected more from the new kinect. Menus are hard to navigate, having to do training for each sport before you can play them individually is frustrating. I just wanted to try one sport first not train every single sport first then be to pick . The face and body scanner is excellent though. Really looks pretty close.
customer_reviews.author: Berner

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: This is a great game for the whole family. We all love playing the games, and I love that it gets us moving. I took it to a family event, and everyone loved it, from 4-65 years old. Bowling, climbing and wake racing are our favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Jen B.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun
customer_reviews.text: This is lots of fun for kids and grownups alike. We've only played with it for a couple of hours so far, but it's been very fun and not so challenging that any of us want to give up right away. The controls aren't always super-responsive so it does get frustrating from time to time, but again it's nothing that will deter us from playing.
customer_reviews.author: Supa D

customer_reviews.title: Cool fun! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Super family fun! Can be a good time killer when you have guests and friends over.
customer_reviews.author: i.Re-view!

customer_reviews.title: Good Exercise for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Get your exercise with this game and Kinect. Get the kids off the couch and into the action with this great game.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Live life regret free - do not purchase this game . . .
customer_reviews.text: This game is bad. Not user friendly and will leave you frustrated, disappointed and regretting the purchase. We played for 30 minutes and put the game away to never play again. Just traded the game in for credit on Amazon. Eventually, it will be a free giveaway with Live, and even then, not worth the free download.
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Sports Game
customer_reviews.text: I don't like how they have the training thing. I would rather just play the game without the hassle when first starting it up. Overall very fun games, I prefer to play two player style.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Reed

customer_reviews.title: fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to get the hang of at first, but the avatar it makes of you is so cool!
customer_reviews.author: CatKittyKitty

customer_reviews.title: Fun multi player games
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game! It makes you unlock every different aspect of the game so it is not good for a group straight out of the box. Takes a while to set up characters too.
customer_reviews.author: gossimer44

customer_reviews.title: Alone, with friends, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun, active Kinect game. I am amazed at what they can get the Kinect to do at times. For example, at the beginning of the game, you have the option of the Kinect scanning you to create your avatar. It's scarily accurate. The games are fun and playing against friends moreso.
customer_reviews.author: EW Maki

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This feels like a step back. You can even run or box. What are you guys thinking?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return. Kinect was not available. Why ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return. Kinect was not available. Why well this game when we can't get the Kinect to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great game for the serious gamer! . . . vbuzz.biz

customer_reviews.title: Fun once you get going
customer_reviews.text: Takes a long time to set up and figure out. Fun once you get going, but kids want to play it and go.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps kids a little active indoors for those winter months in Ohio
customer_reviews.text: Some of the games are fun, sometimes there was a lag on a couple games but the kids had fun.

customer_reviews.title: 8 & qp yr old lost interest too quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Fun game! My 8 & 10 yr old played a few times and are bored now! I think its amazing!

customer_reviews.title: Good times
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the CD and use it a lot with the family.

customer_reviews.title: Boring 👎👎👎
customer_reviews.text: Takes too long loading. Not very user friendly. If you enjoyed playing xbox 360 Sports and Adventures, this game does not stand close to it. In tennis the timing for hitting the ball is off by 3 seconds. Graphics is not what I expected, soccer is cool but get boring quick, bowling is the same as in sports, wave runner is ok, shooting and rock climbing bored me to death. Overall complete waist of money. If you like interactive games, this is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria Mikhalkova

customer_reviews.title: Nice activity game
customer_reviews.text: First of i got it use . I wanted a bowling game for my kids without them using a controller they might accidentally throw at my tv.The games included on this one is pretty nice, love the tennis and bowling. Keeps them active while having fun.

customer_reviews.title: It'll Do for a Party
customer_reviews.text: Bought this since I was having friends over and they wanted me to showcase the Xbox and the Kinect. People had fun, but the games are nothing special. I kind of feel it should have come with the system.

customer_reviews.title: Is a really great game as well it's just hard to get that ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a really great game as well it's just hard to get that get that moves down right you know to be able to do the wall climbing things like that so it's really a lot of fun otherwise.

customer_reviews.text: Not as great as the Xbox 360 version but does the job.

customer_reviews.text: I am very annoying because you said in the title it's (English US ) but after I installed the game, It comes with Mexico language

customer_reviews.text: There are still some glitches. I dislike that I cant play all the games when I have people over because I haven't beaten single player. Poor menu design.

customer_reviews.title: Kinect works perfect with this game
customer_reviews.text: Love the bowling experience without having to use a controller

customer_reviews.title: We really like Kinect Sports on the 360
customer_reviews.text: We really like Kinect Sports on the 360, but for the xbox one they tried to hard to come up with new sports and ultimately failed.

customer_reviews.title: Games aren't that fun connect isn't as accurate as I thought.
customer_reviews.text: Games aren't that fun connect isn't as accurate as I thought. Facial recognition works okay. Stop playing after two months of use.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: sent back had to have another device to use this game

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: arrived quickly and was a good price. I need to readjust my "floor space" on the kinect though. It thinks my livingroom is much bigger than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger Long

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed in this version
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this version. I just wanted a pick your game and go type scenario. I don't want to level up or go through any story. Just let me play.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Scragg

customer_reviews.title: Exausting (for oldsters) Fun
customer_reviews.text: My guests (early 60s as well as pre-teens) really enjoyed this game. Everyone was tired after we stopped. The Kinect makes games like this possible.
customer_reviews.author: RFC

customer_reviews.title: Not a fun family game.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this game for Christmas to go with our new Xbox One we bought for Christmas. It was terrible! What a disappointment. We thought it would be a good game for our whole family to play. We thought it would be just like the Kinect Sports game for the Xbox 360. But, it wasn't! There were no fun games to play like that on the 360. It is an individual game with a virtual coach. We have only played it twice and are still looking for a good family game for the Xbox one. Should have gone with the 360.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, alot of play options, kids love it . The gane forces them to move... which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Noam Kfir

customer_reviews.title: Kinnect Sports
customer_reviews.text: Bowling and Tennis are similar to actual body movements. I don't much care for the rock climbing and the personal water craft. The target shoot would be good with an actual gun device, other wise it is not very life like to point you hand and squeeze you fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Jj

customer_reviews.title: Showpiece for what Kinect CAN do but not going to have you playing much.
customer_reviews.text: I was so desperate to finally get to use the Kinect the way it was meant to be used I jumped to buy this as soon as it came out. Pros: Really the Kinect is just plain cool- making a fist to gas your wave runner- come on! Cons: Not enough sports or variations Have to play through each sport to unlock the others I'm glad I bought it but mostly now just to pull out to show people what Kinect CAN do when they finally make some good games for it. I rarely get it out to just play for fun. I can't believe I'm saying this but the Wii Sports game is actually better (yikes!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty fun!
customer_reviews.text: Bowling and tennis are a lot of fun and pretty responsive. Some of the other games are a little wonky, but overall a fun time.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon W. Newton

customer_reviews.title: ... out all the tricks but it looks to be fun!
customer_reviews.text: Need to figure out all the tricks but it looks to be fun!

customer_reviews.title: The game is really fun, I really love the rock climbing game
customer_reviews.text: The game is really fun, I really love the rock climbing game, but you can get tired after 20 mins. The other games are ok I just didn't like the soccer game, they should have included a boxing game instead of the soccer game
customer_reviews.author: subnam123

customer_reviews.title: Very good game
customer_reviews.text: My living has now turned into a full blown arena for Kinect Sports. Nice game from Microsoft Studios
customer_reviews.author: Mfawa Alfred Onen

customer_reviews.title: Very good if you have the right amount is space
customer_reviews.text: Very good if you have the right amount is space. The avatar didn't really come out the way I expected it to but, that's fine. As I said, it is a very good product and fun game.
customer_reviews.author: Donabel Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Overall a pretty fun game, especially for family or date night.
customer_reviews.text: The game itself is pretty fun, especially for date night or family time. There are several games within the game that are pretty good at instilling activity and fun with the Kinect. My only real complaint with it (and it might be a Kinect issue) is that it isn't real responsive to your movements. Such as the climbing game will often fail as you reach up outside of the view of the Kinect and it can't see you grab the handholds or the bowling game sometimes gets confused and you can't grab the ball or it goes wild when you throw it.
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Gotta love the new kinect.. every one at home loves this game.. it is one of our weekend fav things to play now.
customer_reviews.author: I. Rizo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this game. Fun to play with friends. The tracking works great!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: Love this game!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this game. Wake Racing, Bowling, Rock Climbing, and Tennis is a ton of fun especially in a party scenario. I didn't like target shooting and soccer very much as they felt lame and slow compared to the other games. Kinect picked up movements fairly well overall and missed a couple movements sometimes but its understandable as nothing is perfect! I would recommend this if you just want some friendly competition with your friends and family on physical sports without leaving the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl Wu

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very boring. Disappointed with this new version. I still prefer the one from xbox 360.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the Bowling
customer_reviews.text: Not crazy about any of the other games. But for me it's worth it just to use the bowling part.
customer_reviews.author: DaBizz

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: 1) Amazing 2) Worked 3) Pretty good 4) Nice music 5) It has narrator 6) Im 18 and still enjoy playing Kinect Sports. :)

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not as good as the sports game for Kinect 360
customer_reviews.author: Moustafa Essa

customer_reviews.title: Xbox kinect sports rivals
customer_reviews.text: Grand kids like the game. Not as easy as it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Gross

customer_reviews.title: I'd pass on this one
customer_reviews.text: I'd probably pass on this one.. unless I'm just doing something wrong (which is certainly possible), it forces you to go through certain training games before you can choose any game.. frustrating.. in my opinion they went a bit overboard with the forced tutorials/intros and such.
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Showcases the mediocrity of the new kinect
customer_reviews.text: This game just goes to show that even the new kinect still doesn't work as well as the first one was advertised. While the game modes are pretty fun there is still input delay, especially with 2 people playing at once. The kinect fails to pick up all of the motions it needs to properly control each of the games. The shooting game and tennis are prime examples of where it really cannot keep track of what two people are doing at once. There are annoying delays that throw you off in tennis and the shooting reticule jumps all over. The game itself is fun, but the technology isn't there yet for it to be anything more than meh.
customer_reviews.author: Civildude

customer_reviews.title: great for kids and adults
customer_reviews.text: fun game my only complaint is that you can not skip the training.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Radford

customer_reviews.title: family fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a really fun game to play with my kids. The rock climbing is my favorite and it is actually quite challenging.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Game is cool has some bugs if you play it long

customer_reviews.text: Not bad, kind of fun. Just make sure you have enough space. You need height and width. Not for the JETSKIES though.

customer_reviews.title: Work out!
customer_reviews.text: This is best kinect game ever made. There are six sports to play and bowling is my fav. Wave racing is the hardis to play by far. Climbing is real work out! The story mode is silly but the game play good. If you want to use the kinect get this game.

customer_reviews.title: ... from the Xbox 360 LOL Xbox One has supposedly better Kinect.

customer_reviews.title: No way to play it anymore - don't buy...
customer_reviews.text: Game itself might not be bad, but there's no way to play it on a new system. Don't buy it unless you already have a functioning Xbox One Kinect system (impossible to buy an Xbox One Kinect now...the adapter's only available on eBay for more than $200...)

customer_reviews.text: One of the worst games I've spent $$ on. You can't just play what you want. You have to pass every level of the game in order to move on to the next game. Booooo.!

customer_reviews.text: really fun game for xbox one. Update for kenict adventures

customer_reviews.title: kinect sports rivals review
customer_reviews.text: i just purchased this game recently and love it. the gameplay on the waveracing is great, but the controlles uses the kinect.

customer_reviews.title: Good Game.
customer_reviews.text: bunch of games in it - bowling , tennis, soccer, jet skying, hill climbing etc.
customer_reviews.author: Tarun

customer_reviews.title: Do not get too excited over this game
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this game. I really was! After playing it the last few days I felt like I overpaid for this game. You have to go through a bunch of training and stuff before you can play all the games. Which isn't that bad cause at least you get the controls down. But it felt like I was having to fight with the kinect to get things to work right. The create your champion thing is pretty cool, scans your face and body. Overall, buy this used for $40 or under. Not worth it for it's current price at $59+tax
customer_reviews.author: JimboPA1

customer_reviews.title: Like the original better
customer_reviews.text: Like the original better. Xbox one just doesn't seem to have any kids games and this one wasn't much better. I maybe should have gotten a Sony unit but since the family so enjoyed the Xbox 360, I thought the Xbox one would be better..... IT ISNT!

customer_reviews.title: loving the sports connect rival games
customer_reviews.text: My grand children love it. I can't comment on it but I know they enjoy playing it. They love it.

customer_reviews.title: Less than 1 star .. Booooooring and useless
customer_reviews.text: What a total waste of money and time, took forever to be installed (an hour plus). Stay away, do not buy it. i was unable to give it less than 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: MMB

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed in it though
customer_reviews.text: This one is okay. I was disappointed in it though.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't  come with all its contents
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on the but no map or instruction book which. Not sure if thier is a map and 7 day live trail missing as well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: utterly disappointed
customer_reviews.text: control is difficult and frustrating. My kids gave up stating Wii sports is much better. Game instruction is dismal or just no existent. long wait times to play while watching the same boring intro video is really unnecessary and should have been removed. Wake rider is the only game worth playing and its free already. This game is pretty much a failure. Why can't someone come up with a creative game that can really make the use of Kinect worth while. It should be innovative not a flop.
customer_reviews.author: F&S

customer_reviews.title: Fun Games
customer_reviews.text: I pre-ordered this from Amazon and it was delivered to my house yesterday. I was very impressed with the speed of the order. The games are a lot of fun. There is a learning curve, you have to play a few times and definitely do the tutorials. But even my 3 and 4 yr old had fun mimicking the movements of my wife and I playing the games. The kinect works really well IF you follow the tutorials and do the motions right. My wife had trouble at first, but she soon caught on to the way the games work. I am very happy with the games, as it seems our whole family can take part in them.
customer_reviews.author: RodJK

customer_reviews.title: but the kids liked it so we kept it
customer_reviews.text: We didn't get rivals. We got the ZOO game instead, but the kids liked it so we kept it.
customer_reviews.author: t.stephenson

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: spent a lot of money on this to get it for the kids for their Easter basket. the games just aren't that good. My husband and I tried to play games with the kids and it wasn't fun. we made our own people but then couldn't use them in the games. the games were way to long especially if someone else is trying to play.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Jones

customer_reviews.title: dont buy this game
customer_reviews.text: this is the terrible game, I am very disappointed. Kinect don't work most of the time. it is only worth less than 10$. don't pay 60$ you would be regret it. loading is too long and it forces you to pass those training before you can actually play the game. I don't care any other games except tennis but i had to go tru all training before I can ply tennis, turn out this is terrible. please don't waste the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good. Not great
customer_reviews.text: I was really looking forward to this game and playing with my family. The games are pretty boring and controls are frustrating often. The best part is creating your character and the face recognition is pretty impressive. It's not worth $59 that's for sure. More of a $19.99 game
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This game has a slow start to letting you play on your own. However, once you have the freedom to play it is really fun! I ordered it back on January 2 and got it yesterday. My two best games are bowling and tennis. It is like you are in the game. The other games are fun as well; you just have to try it for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: E Mc

customer_reviews.title: Seriously disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Honestly the original kinect sports was much more fun than this game. I bought rivals because I thought it would be similar but better with the new kinect sensor. Unfortunately though, the games them self (especially soccer..) are absolutely terrible. the only exception I would say is bowling. nothing else is fun. I am truly disappointed with this game.
customer_reviews.author: Mike D.

customer_reviews.title: ¿good game? I don't now ... ¿bad console? Yes!!
customer_reviews.text: Hi. I don't know if it's a good game. The Xbox one, just worked one day!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Andres Martinez

customer_reviews.title: tutorial sucks.
customer_reviews.text: I have to follow the tutorial to play the sports i like to play. What a stupid design! Rare please do something to correct this.

customer_reviews.title: Charlene from Phx. AZ
customer_reviews.text: Very fun to play and good exercise all in one. My 9 yr. old loves to playit all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne

product_meta.title: Microsoft Kinect Sports Rivals Xbox One English US / 5TW-00001
product_meta.description:
IT'S YOU VS. THE WORLD
Kinect Sports Rivals, built for the power of Xbox One, lets you become the champion you were meant to be in an ever-evolving sports competition. Instantly create a super you and take on friends, rivals, and the entire world in the events tennis, bowling, soccer, wake racing, target shooting, and climbing.


A CHALLENGER COMES FORTH
And that challenger is you. The all-new, unparalleled Kinect technology instantly scans you and captures your likeness as a super you: your champion. Now the game is all about you—how you look, how you act, how you compete.

PRECISION UNLEASHED
Xbox One’s all-new sensor technology reinvents motion game play. With specific tracking not only of limbs, but fingers, hand gestures, even facial movements and expressions, Kinect Sports Rivals makes competition more meaningful.

ALWAYS A NEW EXPERIENCE
With different sports happening in multiple zones, you’ll find yourself in the middle of a world of gaming and adventure that grows and evolves based on your tastes, skills, and experiences.

JOIN A TEAM
Teams add a whole new layer. They bind the community and bring life to the competition. When you step into an event, you’ll be able to surround yourself with people that play the way you want to play.
